mapper.select: SELECT * FROM mate_board ORDER BY post_no DESC OFFSET (#{currPage}-1) * #{amount} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{amount} ROWS ONLY
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mate_board(title, content, views, member_id, meeting_status, meeting_area, report_cnt, participant_id_1, participant_id_2, participant_id_3, meeting_time) VALUES( #{title}, #{content}, #{views}, #{member_id}, #{meeting_status}, #{meeting_area}, #{report_cnt}, #{participant_id_1, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{participant_id_2, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{participant_id_3, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{meeting_time} )
